encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Implemented all the changes except changing the the acutes to graves at line-ends (following the edition of West, who always keeps the acute on the final syllable of a hexameter).
Finalized - Implemented all the changes except changing the the acutes to graves at line-ends (following the edition of West, who always keeps the acute on the final syllable of a hexameter).
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Implement all the changes required and finalize.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Implement all the changes required and finalize.

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Metadata is good, and only minor things to note in the text: in i.5 γερων > γέρων, in i.9 double brackets missing on epsilon in μάστειγι (or a comment about the correction), in i.24 change accent to grave on ὑγρήν, in ii.40 I'd prefer iota subscript on the supplement ἐλεήσηι as adscript is present only once, in ii.43 change accent to grave on ἐλθών, in ii.52 I'd prefer iota subscript on the supplement χαλεπήνηι, so also in ii.65 I'd prefer iota subscript on the supplement μίμνηι. For finalization: please cross-reference to APIS entry yale.apis.0015420000.

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Metadata is good, and only minor things to note in the text: in i.5 γερων > γέρων, in i.9 double brackets missing on epsilon in μάστειγι (or a comment about the correction), in i.24 change accent to grave on ὑγρήν, in ii.40 I'd prefer iota subscript on the supplement ἐλεήσηι as adscript is present only once, in ii.43 change accent to grave on ἐλθών, in ii.52 I'd prefer iota subscript on the supplement χαλεπήνηι, so also in ii.65 I'd prefer iota subscript on the supplement μίμνηι. For finalization: please cross-reference to APIS entry yale.apis.0015420000.
Submit - Entered edition from P. Yale 2.96.
Submit - Entered edition from P. Yale 2.96.
